Submodules

calibration.create_calibration_parameters module

create_calibration_parameters.py

Script to define all model, algorithmic, and optimization parameters for calibration of the Lagoudas 1-D SMA model with smooth hardening

# FIXME Add the citation of Lagoudas 2012 IJP.

Widget to define the tab where all the calibration parameters can be tweaked.

getBounds()[source]

Creates the bounds list of lists, that is used in the optimizer.

Returns:

bounds – List of lists containing all DV bounds.

Return type:

LIST

getSpecifiedValues()[source]

Get the values that were specified to be constrained.

Return type:

None.

loadDefaults()[source]

Imports default values for lower and upper bounds of all DVs.

Return type:

None.

set_size_policy(lineEdit)[source]
textToLatex(text, width, height)[source]
uncheck(state)[source]

Translates all of the checkboxes for each material parameter to different DV flags.

Parameters:

state (QtCore.Qt.Checked) – state, either unchecked or checked, for each DV and the other flags.

Return type:

None.

updateSlider()[source]

Update slider values based on upper and lower bounds.

Return type:

None.

updateVal()[source]

Updates the values of upper and lower DV bounds, both in the sliders and in the optimization limits.

Return type:

None.
